scripts.build: rm -rf dist && atlaspack build src/index.js src/index2.js --target ssr
scripts.build:native: rm -rf dist && ATLASPACK_TRACING_MODE="stdout" RUST_LOG="atlaspack=debug,atlaspack_resolver=info" RUST_BACKTRACE=1 atlaspack build --feature-flag nativePackager=true --feature-flag nativePackagerSSRDev=true --target ssr src/index.js src/index2.js
scripts.build:native-src: rm -rf dist && ATLASPACK_REGISTER_USE_SRC=true ATLASPACK_SOURCES=true ATLASPACK_TRACING_MODE="stdout" RUST_LOG="atlaspack=debug,atlaspack_resolver=info" RUST_BACKTRACE=1 ../../core/cli/bin/atlaspack.js build --no-cache --feature-flag nativePackager=true --feature-flag nativePackagerSSRDev=true --target ssr src/index.js src/index2.js
